basics.name: Joel Anto
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with a strong enthusiasm for hardware and robotics, combining software expertise with hands-on system integration to build innovative solutions.

work.name: Robotic club
work.summary: Designed and deployed expressive, multi-node robotics systems using ROS. Integrated Arduino, ESP, and other microcontrollers for sensor fusion, behavioral control, and real-world simulation. Collaborated on frontend visualizations to showcase robotics interactions in real-time.
highlights: Engineered robotic systems with ROS nodes interfacing microcontrollers for adaptive sensing and control
Built modular launch files and C++/Python scripts for distributed behavior and data acquisition
responsibilities: Programmed and interfaced ESP and Arduino microcontrollers for robotics control and sensor data acquisition
Integrated various sensors and actuators for real-world robotic functions including motion, feedback, and environmental interaction
Developed ROS nodes and launch files to orchestrate robot behavior across distributed systems

work.name: Reva Solar Racing
work.summary: Contributed to electrical integration and control systems for a solar-powered race car. Specialized in motor controller programming, solar panel setup, and charging system management to optimize energy usage and vehicle performance.
highlights: Configured and tuned motor controllers for efficient propulsion and responsiveness
Implemented solar panel and battery charging workflows to maximize energy capture and reliability
responsibilities: Installed and monitored solar panels to support onboard power and charging systems
Worked on motor controller interfacing and calibration for high-performance drive systems
Collaborated with cross-functional teams during field testing to refine electrical and energy systems
achievements: Helped build and deploy a fully functional solar race car with integrated energy and control systems

projects.name: DefDrive
projects.description: A web platform that lets users upload files and share them instantly via secure, customizable download links..
highlights: Built with vite-react , tailwind CSS and typescript
